questions.question: 1. Which of the following methods is more accurate for the determination of water content of soil?
2. Soil water content is expressed on what basis?
3. The water content of soil is defined as the ratio of:

answers.a: Volume of water to volume of given soil
answers.b: Volume of water to volume of voids in soil
answers.c: Weight of water to weight of air voids
answers.d: Weight of water to weight of solids of given mass of soil

questions.question: 4. The weight of the soil sample with container is 35g. After drying the soil in oven at 105 C for 24 hours, the dry mass of the soil sample is 24g. The weight of the container is 5g. Determine the water content of the soil sample.
